name: 創新設計（二）
restrict: ◎必須先修過【VDU0253  創新設計（一）】
description: 本課程為設計課程，藉由工作坊形式(workshop)為引導學生藉由草圖、比例模型、基本造型進行設計思考發想(design thinking)、小組討論(group discussion)、動手製作(making)的實體物件與作品發表(presentation)，引導學生實驗與創新，產生新的原創觀點。
syllabus:
課程簡紹

Explore the idea of innovation design by acquiring professional knowledge of design industries to learn the design technologies and processes and apply design thinking to develop an innovative design. 

  
課程目標

1.  Acknowledge the design process and technology to develop innovation in design
2.  Enrich the basic knowledge in design from different scale and discipline
3.  Cultivate wide range of design concept for innovation design
4.  Develop the skill of solving problems in design field

  
教學進度與主題

This class seeks the idea of innovation in design in different scales from product to space by applying the design thinking method. The enrolled students start with an investigation for defining what is an innovative design by looking through different types of design. The first assignment is Hybrid Design, which combines different functions to create innovative design solutions for certain issues that students raise based on their research. It could be a small product or bigger scale as furniture. The second theme is Adaptable Space Use, which can be outdoor furniture or interior space functional conversion or addition in some location of NTNU campus. Students spend roughly six weeks to develop their research and design and make the final presentation to determine the grade.  
  
  
教學進度與主題        (1) Hybrid Design

                                 (2) Adaptable Space Use
